what: gridbr: IBGE statistical grid access with R
title: gridbr: IBGE statistical grid access with R
text: goal ‘gridbr’ provide easy access IBGE Statistical Grid (download available ). builds upon development made project IBGE Statistical Grid Compact Representation (short paper available ).

title: gridbr: IBGE statistical grid access with R
text: can install development version gridbr GitHub repository devtools:

what: gridbr: Download IBGE statistical grid — gridbr
title: gridbr: Download IBGE statistical grid — gridbr
text: Build standardized grid merge population census data.

title: gridbr: Download IBGE statistical grid — gridbr
gridbr: Download IBGE statistical grid — gridbr

what: Download IBGE statistical grid with population census data. — gridbr_download
title: Download IBGE statistical grid with population census data. — gridbr_download
text: Make IBGE statistical grid covering (input) merge population census data.

title: Download IBGE statistical grid with population census data. — gridbr_download
code: gridbr_download(input, cellsize, census_data = TRUE, equal_area = FALSE)

title: Download IBGE statistical grid with population census data. — gridbr_download
text: input object class sf, sfc sfg. cellsize target cell size. Must one : "500KM", "100KM", "50KM", "10KM", "5KM", "1KM" "200M". census_data logical. Set FALSE want include population census data. equal_area logical. Set TRUE want use original grid CRS equal area projection.

title: Download IBGE statistical grid with population census data. — gridbr_download
